Name: Samantha York
Description:
Samantha was shot in the chest and pushed into a closet while her house was set on fire by a 19-year-old solider, James Edward Shaffer. Her body was found stuffed in the closet.

> FAYETTEVILLE A [trans woman] was found dead in the burned-out remains of [her] home Sunday, said Cumberland County Sheriff Morris Bedsole said.
>
> Volunteer firefighters extinguished a blaze at the home of [deadname] "Samantha" York and found York's body in the closet. Bedsole said York had been shot in the chest and [her] body pushed in the closet before the house was set afire.
>
> York was a familiar figure in the area and often dressed as a woman, investigators said.
